firstRewardEpochStartTs().notice: Timestamp when the first reward epoch started, in seconds since UNIX epoch.

firstVotingRoundStartTs().notice: Timestamp when the first voting epoch started, in seconds since UNIX epoch.

getCurrentRewardEpochId().notice: Returns the current reward epoch id.

getCurrentVotingEpochId().notice: Returns the current voting epoch id.

getStartVotingRoundId(uint256).notice: Returns the start voting round id for given reward epoch id.

getVotePowerBlock(uint256).notice: Returns the vote power block for given reward epoch id.

rewardEpochDurationSeconds().notice: Duration of reward epoch, in seconds.

votingEpochDurationSeconds().notice: Duration of voting epoch, in seconds.
